name: One Of Them (yodahekinsew)
description:
I made this game for Discord Jam #5. The theme was Mutation.

In this game, you play as a person who has just been bitten by a walker. As a result, you're slowly mutating into a walker yourself. Find your way to the hospital as you fight enemies and get harmful mutations, and make sure you do so before you become ... one of them.

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move

Left click to swing your bat (close range weapon)

Right click to shoot your gun (far range weapon)
